docs.lead_paragraph: In the galaxy of “Star Trek” fans, the show’s actors are now heroes, no matter how fleeting their appearances on screen.

headline.main: There Are No Small Parts, Only Long Memories
headline.print_headline: There Are No Small Parts, Only Long Memories

docs.snippet: In the galaxy of “Star Trek” fans, the show’s actors are now heroes, no matter how fleeting their appearances on screen.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cradle of Aviation Museum has a deficit of $1.5 million, it has been criticized in an audit by the county comptroller, and its management team has been pressured for months by Nassau County leaders. Now Thomas R. Suozzi, the county executive, has come up with a plan he said could save the museum at Mitchel Field in Garden City. He announced a 10-point plan on Sept. 26 to stabilize the museum, which charts the history of flying from the early days of kites and hot air balloons through the race to the moon and beyond.

headline.main: Suozzi Offers Plan to Shore Up Aviation Museum

docs.abstract: The Week column; Nassau County Executive Thomas Suozzi announces 10-point plan to stabilize Cradle of Aviation Museum, which has deficit of $1.5 million; names Deputy County Executive Christopher Hahn to recruit new board and raise donations; Nassau County officials say two-year-old drug discount card program has saved county residents $6 million and has served as model for other municipalities (S)
